describe: simple state machine with a single pass state and the result set as 'Hello World!'

tests.describe: should return 'Hello World!' as the output with the input set as '{}'

tests.name: hello
tests.describe: should return 'Hello World!' as the output with the input set as '[]'
should return 'Hello World!' as the output with the input set as '{"tea": "test"}'
should return 'Hello World!' as the output with the input set as '[1,2]'

definition.Comment: A Hello World example of the Amazon States Language using a Pass state
